lead_paragraph: Officials said athletes would live on the U.C.L.A. campus. A proposal released last year had envisioned a $1 billion athletes’ village on the site of a rail yard near downtown.

headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Switches Plan for Athlete Village for 2024 Games
headline.main: Los Angeles Switches Plan for Athletes’ Village for 2024 Games

snippet: Officials said athletes would live on the U.C.L.A. campus. A proposal released last year had envisioned a $1 billion athletes’ village on the site of a rail yard near downtown....
